test.title: This is a question which has a multiple answer options!
answers: Answer One
Answer Two
Another Answer

test.title: Below is a list of problems that can be observed during testing or operation. Which is MOST likely a failure?
answers: The product crashed when the user selected an option in a dialog box
One source code file included in the build was the wrong version
The computation algorithm used the wrong input variables
The developer misinterpreted the requirement for the algorithm

test.title: Which of the following will prevent defects from reoccurr?
answers: Rotating developers to keep them motivated
Determining the environmental conditions that caused the failure
improving processes based on root cause analysis
Prioritizing reoccuring defects higher than new defects

test.title: Why is it important to avoid the pesticide paradox?
answers: Dynamic testing is lessjable in finding bugs
Pesticides mixed with static testing can allow bugs to escape detection
Tests should not be context dependent
Running the same tests over and over will reduce the chance of finding new defects score

test.title: Which of the following is a true statement about exhaustive testing ?
answers: It is a form of stress testing
It is not feasible except in the case of trivial software
It is commonly done with test automation
It is normally the responsibility of the developer during unit testing

test.title: Which of the following statements best describes one of the seven key principles of software testing ?
answers: Automated tests are better than manual tests for avoiding the exhaustive testing
Exhaustive testing is, with sufficient effort and tool support, feasible for all software
Itis normally impossible to test all input/output combinations for a software system
The purpose of testing is to demonstrate the absence of defects

test.title: According to the ISTQB Glossary, the word “bug” is synonymous with which of the following?
answers: Error
Incident
Defect
Mistake

test.title: Which characteristic must a tester possess in order to be successful when working with a project team?
answers: Constructive Communication Skills
Authoritarian leadership style
Extroverted personality
Extensive organizational network

test.title: If test cases are derived from looking at the code, what type of test design technique is being used?
answers: Black Box
White Box
Experience-based
Behavior-based

test.title: When should the expected results of a test case be defined?
answers: When the test case is written, prior to execution
When the test case is executed
When the risk is assessed
When the test condition is identified

test.title: Which of the following test techniques uses the requirements specifications as the test basis??
answers: Structure-based
Black-box
White-box
Exploratory

test.title: You are testing a machine that scores exam papers and assigns grades. Based on the score achieved the grades are as follows:1-49 = F, 50-59 = D-, 60-69 = D, 70-79 = C, 80-89 = B, 90-100=A
Which one of the following best describes a characteristic of a keyword driven test execution tool?
answers: Actions of testers recorded in a script that is run with several sets of test input data
A table with test input data, action words, and expected results, controls execution of the system under test
The ability to log test results and compare them against the expected results, stored in a text file
Actions of testers recorded in a script that is rerun several times

test.title: A tool that supports traceability, recording of incidents or scheduling of tests is called
answers: Test management tool
Test execution tool
Dynamic analysis tool
Debugging tool

test.title: The place to start if you want to use a new test tool is
answers: Analyze your needs and requirements
Invite a vendor to give a demo
Attend a tool exhibition
Find out what your budget would be for the tool

test.title: Which of the following would NOT be done as part of selecting a tool for an organization?
answers: Evaluate the tool features against clear requirements and objective criteria
Roll out the tool to as many users as possible within the organization
Assess organizational maturity, strengths and weaknesses
Identify internal requirements for coaching and mentoring in the use of the tool
